Name: Image.Blur
Desc: Applies a blur effect to the image using various kernels.
LongDesc: The Blur method applies a blur effect to the image using different kernel types such as gaussian, box, motion, or lens. It supports adjustable radius, quality, direction, and other advanced options for simulating realistic blur effects.
Example:
var img = new Q.Image({ width: 300, height: 200 });
img.Load('photo.jpg', function() { img.Blur({ radius: 10, type: 'gaussian' }); });
